feed.title: Could This Be Any More…?
feed.subtitle: "Could This Be Any More...?" is a podcast featuring Aaron and Erica Bushnell. They topically discuss this rhetorical question with their past experiences, awful jokes and banter.

entry.title: 8-bit
entry.content: Alright, so technically we’re including 16-bit, 32-bit and 64-bit consoles. But titles are hard, okay? In this episode Aaron and Erica have their family join the show to discuss favorite games, consoles and what kind of impact video games had in their lives. 👾
entry.summary: Alright, so technically we’re including 16-bit, 32-bit and 64-bit consoles. But titles are hard, okay? In this episode Aaron and Erica have their family join the show to discuss favorite games, consoles and what kind of impact video games had in their lives. 👾

entry.title: Humid
entry.content: Aaron and Erica talk about summer-y things like favorite foods, vacation spots and what kept them busy when school was out. Also some unfortunate movie and baby product reviews. 💩 🍼
entry.summary: Aaron and Erica talk about summer-y things like favorite foods, vacation spots and what kept them busy when school was out. Also some unfortunate movie and baby product reviews. 💩 🍼

entry.title: Awkward
entry.content: The first episode! Aaron and Erica play with fidget spinners, introduce a new member of the family and share their awkward stories. There’s farting dogs, running into parked cars and that’s only a portion of the awkwardness.
entry.summary: The first episode! Aaron and Erica play with fidget spinners, introduce a new member of the family and share their awkward stories. There’s farting dogs, running into parked cars and that’s only a portion of the awkwardness.

entry.title: The Pilot
entry.content: Aaron and Erica kick things off by discussing what this podcast is, the format of the show and what’s in store for upcoming episodes.
entry.summary: Aaron and Erica kick things off by discussing what this podcast is, the format of the show and what’s in store for upcoming episodes.
